Package in.itzmeanjan.filterit.transform

Class LogTransformation

java.lang.Object
in.itzmeanjan.filterit.transform.LogTransformation
Direct Known Subclasses:
InverseLogTransformation
public class LogTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
Given an image ( either color or grayscaled ), we'll trasform each pixel intensity value by using one logarithm based function & output image to be buffered.

Transformation can be controlled by changing `base` value of logarithm, mostly we'll use e or 10.

  • Method Details

    • transform

      public java.awt.image.BufferedImage transform​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img, double base)
      Given an instance of BufferedImage class & logarithm base value i.e. 10 or e, it'll compute transformed pixel intensity values for each color component ( R, G or B ), which is to be stored in a new BufferedImage object, which will be returned

      Now concurrent processing using thread pool has been implemented, initially starting with as many number of threads ( in threadpool ) as many CPU cores are made avaiable to JVM

    • transform

      public java.awt.image.BufferedImage transform​(java.lang.String src, double base)
      Given a source image file, which will be buffered and above defined method to be invoked with that buffered image, returns transformed image
